description.jp: ひとたび絵筆を握れば 大人顔負けの画才を発揮する少女。描いたものを実体化させるという 不思議な能力を身につけている。ストラゴスの後を追い半ば強引に一行の仲間に加わるほどの行動派。口こそ悪いが 時に厳しく時に優しく仲間を支えた。
description.gl: A young girl whose skill with a brush puts grownups to shame. She has the mysterious ability to bring her paintings to life. The proactive type, she goes after Strago and half-forces her way into the Returners. Though cheeky, she supports the party with both her kindness and a good scolding from time to time.

jp.text: お絵かきなら なんでもこいのリルム様 登場！
にくらしいけど\nほうっておけないじじいがいるヨ！
弱音ばっかりはいてると似顔絵かくぞ！
こらあ！くそじじー！！！しゃきっとせんかあ！！！
おじいちゃんより先に\nいくわけないでしょ！！\nこのおいぼれ！！ ふふ！
…でもね \n本当の似顔絵をおじいちゃんに\n一度はかいてあげたいの

gl.text: I wanted to practice my drawing. I am a budding virtuoso、 after all!
An obnoxious grandpa...who I couldn't live without!
Any more whining out of you、 and I'll paint your picture!
Come on now、 you stubborn old bag of bones! Snap out of it!
Did you really think I was gonna check out before you、 you old geezebag!? Ha-ha-ha...
...But、 you know、 someday I really would like to paint your portrait. ...On canvas、 I mean!

desc.gl:
Grants party BRV based on own MAX BRV
Triggers effect of equipped summon
4-hit group magic BRV attack + group HP attack
Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
Deals proportionate HP damage to each target
Self: 5 turns MAX BRV Up II; 8 turns SPD Up II
BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ with active buff
Individual summon effects as follows:
 • Chocobo: Group melee BRV attack
 • Sylph: Grants party BRV, restores HP based on own ATK
 • Shiva: Group Ice magic BRV attack
 • Ifrit: Group Fire magic BRV attack
 • Ramuh: Group Thunder magic BRV attack
 • Leviathan: Group Water magic BRV attack
 • Alexander: Group Holy magic BRV attack
 • Diabolos: Group Dark magic BRV attack
 • Odin: Group melee BRV attack; moderate chance of inflicting Break
 • The Brothers: Group Earth melee BRV attack
 • Pandemonium: Group Wind magic BRV attack; easier knock back
 • Bahamut: Group magic BRV attack

味方全員に自身の最大BRVに依存した量のBRVを加算し
装備中の召喚獣に応じた効果発動＋4HIT全体魔法BRV攻撃＋全体HP攻撃
奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する 上限は自身の最大BRVの150％分
与えるHPダメージは分配

召喚獣別効果は以下の通り
・チョコボ：全体近距離物理BRV攻撃
・シルフ：味方全員に自身の攻撃力に依存した量の BRV加算とHP回復
・シヴァ：氷 イフリート：火 ラムウ：雷 リヴァイアサン：水
　アレクサンダー：聖 ディアボロス：闇 それぞれの属性全体魔法BRV攻撃

・精霊モーグリ：ティナの弱体効果を全て回復

name.jp: スケッチ召喚エクステンド

desc.en:
[Sketch Summon] use +2

When using [Sketch Summon]:
• Increases party's BRV by 50% of Max BRV before summon
• Raises own Attack by 60% during BRV attacks
• Triggers a 4-HIT AoE magic BRV attack before HP attack (50% per hit)
• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV
• [MAX BRV Up] effect +30%; duration +2
• Self: 8 turns 40% [SPD Up]

While buffed
• [BRV Attack] becomes [BRV Attack+]:
　∟ BRV attack hit count becomes 2
　∟ Increases total BRV potency by 40%
　∟ Increases BRV damage dealt by 50% when attacking targets afflicted with [Sketch] debuff
desc.gl:
Sketch Summon use +2

When using Sketch Summon:
 • Grants party BRV based on own MAX BRV before summon
 • Moderately increases BRV damage dealt with Sketch Summon
 • Additional 4-hit magic BRV attack before HP attack
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
 • Slight MAX BRV Up boost, duration +2
 • Self: 8 turns SPD Up II

With active buffs:
 • BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (BRV attack hit count becomes 2; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage; deals extra BRV damage to targets afflicted with Sketch debuff)
desc.jp:
「スケッチ召喚」の使用回数＋2

「スケッチ召喚」使用時
・装備中の召喚獣に応じた効果発動前に
　味方全員に自身の最大BRVに依存した量のBRVを加算
・「スケッチ召喚」の与えるBRVダメージ中アップ
・HP攻撃前に
　4HIT全体魔法BRV攻撃を追加
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの150％分
・「最大BRVアップ」の効果小アップと2ACTION期間延長
・自身に8ACTION「素早さ中アップ」付与

自身に強化効果が付与されている時
通常「BRV攻撃」が以下の「BRV攻撃＋」に変化
・BRV攻撃のHIT数が2HITに変化し
　合計BRV威力も中アップ
・「スケッチ」の弱体効果が付与された対象に
　より大きなBRVダメージ

name.jp: スケッチエクステンド

desc.en:
[Sketch] use +4

When using [Sketch]:
• Increases party's BRV by 30% of Max BRV before BRV attacks
• BRV attack hit count becomes 5
• Increases total BRV potency by 120%
• Increases BRV damage dealt by 50% when attacking targets afflicted with [Sketch] debuff
• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV
• [ATK Up] effect +20%; duration +3
• HP attack after use

After using [Sketch]
• [Sketch] becomes [Sketch+]
　∟ Moves own next turn to just before target's next turn on hit (except during summoning)
　∟ Target: 1 turn 50% [Blind]
　∟ Returns to [Sketch] after use
desc.gl:
Sketch use +4

When using Sketch:
 • Grants party BRV based on own MAX BRV before BRV attack
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 5; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Deals extra BRV damage to targets afflicted with Sketch debuff
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
 • Slight ATK Up boost, duration +3
 • Triggers additional HP attack after use

After using Sketch:
 • Sketch becomes Sketch+ (moves next turn to before target if turn would otherwise come after [except during summoning]; target: 1 turn Blind; returns to Sketch after use)
desc.jp:
「スケッチ」の使用回数＋4

「スケッチ」使用時
・BRV攻撃前に
　味方全員に自身の最大BRVに依存した量のBRVを加算
・BRV攻撃のHIT数が5HITに変化し
　合計BRV威力も極大アップ
・「スケッチ」の弱体効果が付与された対象に
　より大きなBRVダメージ
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの150％分
・「攻撃力アップ」の効果小アップと3ACTION期間延長
・使用後 追加HP攻撃が発動

「スケッチ」使用後
「スケッチ」が「スケッチ＋」に変化し
以下の効果が追加
・対象にHIT時
　次回行動順がターゲットより後ろの場合
　ターゲットの直前に移動（召喚中は除く）
・対象に1ACTION「暗闇」付与
・使用後「スケッチ」に戻る

name.en: Star Prism BRV HP Hit Plus Force Advance++
name.gl: Star Prism BRV HP Hit Plus Force Advance++
name.jp: スタープリズムBRVHPヒットプラスフォースアドバンス＋＋

desc.en:
When using [Star Prism]:
• 12-HIT AoE magic BRV attack + AoE HP attack delivered twice
• Increases total BRV potency by 960%
• Increases stolen BRV overflow limit by 20%

While buffed:
• [BRV Attack], [BRV Attack+] become [BRV Attack++]:
　∟ Increases party's BRV by 20% of Max BRV before BRV attacks
　∟ 2-HIT magic BRV attack (70% per hit)
　∟ Increases BRV damage dealt by 50% when attacking targets afflicted with [Sketch]
　∟ Extends own buffs by 1 turn
• [HP Attack], [HP Attack+] become [HP Attack++]:
　∟ Increases party's BRV by 20% of Max BRV before BRV attacks
　∟ 2-HIT magic BRV attack + HP attack (60% per hit)
　∟ Increases BRV damage dealt by 50% when attacking targets afflicted with [Sketch]
　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
　∟ Extends own buffs by 1 turn
　∟ Lowers Action Delay by 4 compared to [HP Attack]
desc.gl:
When using Star Prism:
 • 6-hit group magic BRV attack + group HP attack becomes 12-hit group magic BRV attack + HP attack delivered 2 times; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Slightly raises limit of BRV that may be stolen in excess of MAX BRV

With active buffs:
 • BRV Attack, BRV Attack+ become BRV Attack++ (grants party BRV based on own MAX BRV; 2-hit magic BRV attack; deals extra BRV damage to targets afflicted with Sketch debuff; extends own buff duration 1 turn)
 • HP Attack, HP Attack+ become HP Attack++ (grants party BRV based on own MAX BRV; 2-hit magic BRV attack + HP attack; deals extra BRV damage to targets afflicted with Sketch debuff; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%; extends own buff duration 1 turn; high turn rate)
desc.jp:
「スタープリズム」使用時
・6HIT全体魔法BRV攻撃＋全体HP攻撃が
　12HIT全体魔法BRV攻撃＋全体HP攻撃を2回行う
　に変化し 合計BRV威力も極大アップ
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する上限を小アップ

自身に強化効果が付与されている時
通常「BRV攻撃」「BRV攻撃＋」が以下の「BRV攻撃＋＋」に変化
・味方全員に自身の最大BRVに依存した量のBRVを加算
・2HIT魔法BRV攻撃
・「スケッチ」の弱体効果が付与された対象に
　より大きなBRVダメージ
・自身に付与された強化効果を1ACTION延長する
通常「HP攻撃」「HP攻撃＋」が以下の「HP攻撃＋＋」に変化
・味方全員に自身の最大BRVに依存した量のBRVを加算
・2HIT魔法BRV攻撃＋HP攻撃
・「スケッチ」の弱体効果が付与された対象に
　より大きなBRVダメージ
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの120％分
・自身に付与された強化効果を1ACTION延長する
・行動負荷が低い
